<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0037__main__3"/>Such
was the history of my beloved cotta<lb n="c57-0037__main__4"/>gers. It
<del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5130__Start"/>struck<del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5130__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>impressed

deeply, <del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5143__Start"/>and<del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5143__End"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5151__Start"/>prom<del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5151__End"/><del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5154__Start"/>it fr<del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5154__End"/>
I
learned
from

the views <lb n="c57-0037__left_margin__2"/>of social <lb n="c57-0037__left_margin__3"/>life which <lb n="c57-0037__left_margin__4"/>it

to admire <lb n="c57-0037__main__5"/>their

& to deprecate the vices of

<lb n="c57-0037__main__6"/><del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5187__Start"/>But crimes were distant<del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5187__End"/><del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5190__Start"/>But<del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5190__End"/>As
yet I looked <lb n="c57-0037__main__7"/>upon crime as a distant evil;

me
to
desire to become an actor in the <lb n="c57-0037__main__10"/>busy scene where so many admirable <lb n="c57-0037__main__11"/>qualities were called forth and displayed.
<lb n="c57-0037__main__12"/>But <del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5268__Start"/>I<del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5268__End"/>
in giving

I must not <lb n="c57-0037__main__14"/>omit a circumstance
<del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5282__Start"/>that took<del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5282__End"/>which occurred<lb n="c57-0037__main__15"/><del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5289__Start"/>place<del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5289__End"/>
in the beginning of the month <lb n="c57-0037__main__16"/>of August of

year.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0037__main__17"/>One night
during my accustomed <lb n="c57-0037__main__18"/>visit to the neighbouring

where <lb n="c57-0037__main__19"/>I collected my own

my protectors, I found <lb n="c57-0037__main__21"/>on the ground a leathern

<lb n="c57-0037__main__22"/>containing several articles of dress & some <lb n="c57-0037__main__23"/>books. I

eagerly seized the
prize&<lb n="c57-0037__main__24"/>returned

The books <lb n="c57-0037__main__25"/>were
fortunately
written in the
language
<lb n="c57-0037__left_margin__1"/>the elements <lb n="c57-0037__left_margin__2"/>of
which<lb n="c57-0037__main__26"/>I

<lb n="c57-0037__left_margin__2"/><del loc="c57-0037__left_margin__d1e5408__Start"/>infinite<del loc="c57-0037__left_margin__d1e5408__End"/>extreme<lb n="c57-0037__left_margin__3"/>delight<metamark function="displacement">^</metamark>

could

<lb n="c57-0037__main__33"/><del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5460__Start"/>concerns<del loc="c57-0037__main__d1e5460__End"/>occupations. I

but

to

<lb n="c57-0038__main__5"/>Sorrows
of
Werter
besides the
interrest
of its <lb n="c57-0038__main__6"/>simple and affecting

<lb n="c57-0038__main__7"/>canvassed
and so many lights thrown upon what<lb n="c57-0038__left_margin__1"/> had

that I found
<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>in

& astonishment. The <lb n="c57-0038__main__10"/>gentle and domestic manners it

and

well with my experience among my
pro<lb n="c57-0038__main__13"/>tectors. <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>and
with the wants which were for ever alive
within

or

His cha<lb n="c57-0038__main__15"/>racter contained no

but it sunk
<lb n="c57-0038__main__16"/>deep â€“ <del loc="c57-0038__main__d1e5638__Start"/>for he thought<del loc="c57-0038__main__d1e5638__End"/>

<del loc="c57-0038__main__d1e5643__Start"/>gave<del loc="c57-0038__main__d1e5643__End"/>

â€“

read however

& related to

My person <lb n="c57-0038__main__33"/>was
hideous

What <lb n="c57-0038__main__34"/>did this mean? Who was I? What was
I?<lb n="c57-0039__main__1"/><lb n="c57-0039__left_margin__1"/>Whence

Sorrows<del loc="c57-0039__main__d1e5827__End"/>
the letters
of

unterstanding

only school
